title: 3h ago Trump slams 'stupid trade' amid trade war worries
content: United States President Donald Trump took to Twitter on Saturday to slam trade agreements the country currently has with a number of other countries as it begins to seem more and more evident that a trade war is beginning.    Trump stated: "The United States must, at long last, be treated fairly on Trade. If we charge a country ZERO to sell their goods, and they charge us 25, 50 or even 100 percent to sell ours, it is UNFAIR and can no longer be tolerated. That is not Free or Fair Trade, it is Stupid Trade!"    The US is taking part in a G7 meeting this weekend, but there has been no word of a solution to the complaints of Washington.    Breaking the News / VP
